snippet: David P. Rosen, 64, a former administrator of MediSys, funneled money to legislators in exchange for favors for his organization.
abstract: David P Rosen, former hospital chief executive, is sentenced to three years in prison for bribing New York State Senator Carl Kruger and others to use their influence to benefit his health care organization MediSys.
lead_paragraph: David P. Rosen, 64, a former administrator of MediSys, funneled money to legislators in exchange for favors for his organization.

headline.seo: David P. Rosen, Hospital Executive, Sentenced in Bribery Case
headline.main: Executive of Hospital Gets 3 Years for Bribery
headline.print_headline: Former Hospital Chief Gets 3 Years in Bribe Conspiracy
